frontmatter.title: Creating Your Own “Google Drive” with a Raspberry Pi and Nextcloud
frontmatter.summary: I’ll walk you through building a powerful and scalable 20TB network-attached storage (NAS) system using a Raspberry Pi and Nextcloud.

frontmatter.title: Building Scalable Distributed Systems with a Raspberry Pi and K3S
frontmatter.summary: In this project, I’m leveraging a Raspberry Pi cluster to create scalable distributed systems. By connecting multiple Raspberry Pis, I aim to enhance processing capabilities and explore the principles of distributed computing, making complex tasks more efficient and manageable.

frontmatter.title: Exploring Computer Vision with Jetson Orin Nano: Unlocking AI at the Edge
frontmatter.summary: I’m using the Jetson Orin Nano to dive into computer vision, harnessing its power for real-time analysis

frontmatter.title: Building a Rack Server for Experimental Projects: A Hands-On Approach to Hardware and Innovation
frontmatter.summary: This project is designed to push the boundaries of hardware experimentation, providing a flexible environment for testing and learning.

frontmatter.title: From Strategy Games to AI-Driven QR Codes: A Journey Through My Diverse Software Creations
frontmatter.summary: In this post, I introduce three of my software projects: “Greedy Kings,” a strategy-driven offline iOS game; “Talkie,” a React app that turns text into speech; and “Magic QR,” an iOS app that generates AI-powered QR codes embedded within images. Each project showcases different ways I’ve used coding to create engaging experiences and practical solutions.

frontmatter.title: Achieving Clarity: Effective Methods for Data Correlation Smoothing
frontmatter.summary: To smooth out data correlations and reduce the effect of spikes in temperature and humidity readings, I used techniques like the moving average (or rolling average). By averaging each data point with its neighboring values, I created more stable and reliable data for better analysis.

frontmatter.title: Building an FPV Racing Drone from Scratch: My Path to High-Speed Flying
frontmatter.summary: I crafted an FPV (First Person View) racing drone from the ground up, selecting and assembling each part carefully. This hands-on experience was thrilling and helped me understand the challenges of creating a fast and agile drone.

frontmatter.title: Smart Rooms and Colorful Lights: Designing an Innovative Home Environment
frontmatter.summary: Discover how I utilized Amazon Alexa and ESP32 modules to create smart home solutions that seamlessly connect to Alexa. I also developed remote-controlled RGB lights using an ESP32, with a custom app designed by my friend, transforming my living space into a vibrant, interactive environment.

frontmatter.title: Creating a Network-Attached Watering System: Using ESP32 and LoRa for Soil Data Collection
frontmatter.summary: In this project, I built a network-attached watering system using ESP32 and a LoRa module to collect soil information with advanced sensors. The devices communicate among themselves, sending data to a master device that relays it to a server. This information is stored in a database and visualized through a Telegram bot for each user, facilitating effective monitoring and analysis of soil conditions.

frontmatter.title: Crafting Power Supplies: Turning Any Input into Adjustable Voltage for My Projects
frontmatter.summary: I built two power supplies: the first converts 220V into a controllable 1.5V to 36V output, and the second takes any input up to 36V and regulates it. Both are designed to provide precise voltage control for different projects.

frontmatter.title: Designing Safe Firework Launchers: Remote and Wired Solutions for Controlled Rocket Launching
frontmatter.summary: I share my experiences building two safe firework launchers: a remote rocket launcher and a wired version. Explore the fun and safety tips I learned along the way, making fireworks enjoyable for everyone

frontmatter.title: Mastering Arduino: Building Bluetooth and Remote-Controlled Systems for Creative Automation
frontmatter.summary: In this blog, I explore two exciting Arduino projects: building Bluetooth-enabled devices and creating remote-controlled systems.

frontmatter.title: Securing Access: Building a Passcode-Protected Door Lock with Arduino
frontmatter.summary: In this project, I designed a door lock system using Arduino, a motor with a motor driver, and an Arduino keyboard. By implementing a passcode mechanism.

frontmatter.title: From Childhood Curiosity to Engineering: My Journey with the Tesla Coil
frontmatter.summary: Discover how my childhood curiosity led me to build a Tesla coil as my first project, sparking a lifelong passion for engineering and shaping my journey in technology.
